description:
* Based on a love comedy light novel series written by http://anidb.net/cr73614 [Hibariyu] and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr64641 [Shiso].
Hayato transfers to a high school in the city. There, he is reunited with Haruki, whom Hayato remembers as a boy he used to play with seven years ago. Only, Hayato now realizes that Haruki is actually a girl.
Source: ANN

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 転校先の清楚可憐な美少女が、昔男子と思って一緒に遊んだ幼馴染だった件

titles.title: Tenkou-saki no Seiso Karen na Bishoujo ga, Mukashi Danshi to Omotte Issho ni Asonda Osananajimi Datta Ken
転校先の清楚可憐な美少女が, 昔男子と思って一緒に遊んだ幼馴染だった件
